attributes.action: Heavy prison sentencing for ANYBODY caught carrying a knife...
attributes.additional_details:
please sign the petition and share it as far as it will go...
we need to protect our future..
attributes.background:
way to many people are losing their lives due to this knife culture..
youngers are under the impression they can take a life with no reprocussions..
its time to change that...
somethig needs to be done before more and more people resort to protecting themselve by fighting fire with fire..
